CIPHER.0.cipherString: A lot of times, you feel like you're walking on eggshells in a creative environment, because everyone's having to watch out for egos so much of the time.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: As a kid, all I wanted to do was be in a Viking film.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword clocks.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Nature is a mutable cloud which is always and never the same.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword macro.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: Jerry Ford is so dumb he can't fart and chew gum at the same time.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword analyzed.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword chair.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: A man cannot be too careful in the choice of his enemies.
CIPHER.5.question: Encode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword economic.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: I've dodged bullets but there's no scandal in my life.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: Ambition - it is the last infirmity of noble minds.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Your worth consists in what you are and not in what you have.
